column1: Table 12: Number of sentenced prisoners under State or Federal jurisdiction per 100,000 residents, by gender, race, Hispanic origin, and age, 2003
Authors:  Paige M. Harrison and Allen J. Beck
Table 12. Number of sentenced prisoners under State or Federal jurisdiction per 100,000 residents, by gender, race, Hispanic origin, and age, 2003

Note: Based on estimates of the U.S. resident population on July 1, 2003, using intercensal estimates for July 1, 2002 (by gender, race, and Hispanic origin) and adjusted to the July 1, 2003, estimates by gender.
a/Includes America Indians, Alaska Native, Asians, Native Hawaiians, and other Pacific Islanders.
